snippet: The USA Yoga Federation will host the ninth Regional New York and National Yoga Asana Championship at the Hudson Theater in Midtown Manhattan this weekend.
abstract: USA Yoga Federation will host the ninth Regional New York and National Yoga Asana Championship at the Hudson Theater in Midtown Manhattan; while some critics say competition is anathema to the spirit of yoga, the federation's founder Rajashree Choudhury's ultimate goal is to promote yoga asana so that it will be legitimized as a sport and accepted into the Olympics.
lead_paragraph: The USA Yoga Federation will host the ninth Regional New York and National Yoga Asana Championship at the Hudson Theater in Midtown Manhattan this weekend.

headline.seo: New York Welcomes Yoga Asana Championships
headline.main: Uniting Body and Mind, With a Bit of a Stretch
headline.print_headline: Body and Mind United With a Bit of a Stretch
